text: Roberto Serniotti (born ) is an Italian volleyball coach. A head coach of Cuneo Volley currently playing in Italian Serie A3.Roberto Serniotti allena il Cuneo Vbc in serie B – lastampa.it – 13.02.2018 – Retrieved 02.02.2020 A former head coach of many teams in the whole of Europe, among others, Berlin Recycling VolleysRoberto Serniotti, un torinese a Berlino – tuttosport.com – 03.06.2015 – Retrieved 02.02.2020, Tours VB, Trentino VolleyRoberto Serniotti nuovo allenatore della Trentino Volley, Simone Roscini il suo vice – trentinovolley.it – 03.07.2013 – Retrieved 02.02.2020. He was an assistant coach of France men's national volleyball team and Italy men's national volleyball team. In 2017 he became a head coach of Asseco Resovia.POL M: OFFICIAL – Roberto Serniotti is the new head coach of Asseco Resovia – worldofvolley.com – 14.05.2017 – Retrieved 02.02.2020Resovia: Via Serniotti, torna Kowal – volleyball.it – 03.12.2017 – Retrieved 02.02.2020POL M: Officially – Serniotti and Resovia part ways, Kowal is back – worldofvolley.com – 03.12.2017 – Retrieved 02.02.2020 ==Sporting achievements== * CEV Champions League ** 16px 2004/2005 – with Tours VBTOURS STRONGER THAN HOST TEAM – cev.eu – 25.03.2005 – Retrieved 02.02.2020 – Archived 22.07.2011 * CEV Cup ** 16px 2007/2008 – with Roma Volley ** 16px 2015/2016 – with Berlin Recycling Volleys * FIVB Club World Championship ** 16px Brazil 2013 – with Trentino Volley * National championships ** 1999/2000 16px Italian SuperCup, with Cuneo Volley ** 2003/2004 16px French Championship, with Tours VB ** 2004/2005 16px French Cup, with Tours VB ** 2005/2006 16px French SuperCup, with Tours VB ** 2005/2006 16px French Cup, with Tours VB ** 2005/2006 16px French Championship, with Tours VB ** 2013/2014 16px Italian SuperCup, with Trentino Volley ** 2015/2016 16px German Cup, with Berlin Recycling Volleys ** 2015/2016 16px German Championship, with Berlin Recycling Volleys ** 2016/2017 16px German Championship, with Berlin Recycling Volleys ==References== ==External links== * LegaVolley coach profile Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Italian volleyball coaches Category:Volleyball coaches of international teams Category:Sportspeople from Turin Category:Resovia Rzeszów coaches
title: Roberto Serniotti
